name: APPLIANCES, LARGE
details: dishwashers, washer/dryers, stoves, fridges, etc

name: APPLIANCES, SMALL
details: microwaves, blenders, toasters, vacuums, space heaters, fans, etc.

name: BEDDING / BATH
details: sheets/linens, blankets, comforters, towels, small rugs, etc.

name: BIKES / EXERCISE / SPORTING / CAMPING
details: bikes/parts, helmets, skateboards, balls, backpacks, tents, etc.

name: BLDG MATERIALS / HOME IMPROVEMENT
details: dimensional lumber, plumbing, electrical, paint, hand tools, power tools, doors, windows, lights, hardware, carpeting , etc.

name: CDs, DVDs, LPs, video games, etc.
CELL PHONES
details: preferably with chargers

name: CHILDREN'S GOODS / CLOTHING
details: strollers, bike trailers/seats, baby gates, cribs, high chairs, playpens, diapers/diaper bags, accessories, toys, clothing, nursing items, maternity, etc.

name: COMPUTER PAPER
details: ok if printed on one side

name: FABRIC
details: material, batting, supplies

name: FOOD (unopened, pre-expired)
details: non-perishable canned and packaged food and beverages

name: FOOD (surplus garden produce)
details: freshly grown foods with no visible signs of spoilage

name: FOOD CONTAINERS
details: clean glass/plastic w/lids

name: GARDEN / FARM / LANDSCAPING
details: supplies, hoses, fencing/posts, lawn furniture, mowers, wheelbarrows, BBQs, hand tools, farm tools, gloves, seeds, seeders, mulch/soil amendments, livestock supplies, stakes, etc.

name: HOME ELECTRONICS
details: TVs, CD or DVD players, iPads/iPods, gaming consoles, stereos, cameras, alarm clocks, etc.

name: HOUSEHOLD GOODS
details: luggage, utensils, dishes, cookware, cleaning supplies, decor, art, etc.

name: MEDICAL EQUIPMENT / SUPPLIES
details: wheelchairs, walkers, crutches, canes, blood pressure monitors, shower chairs, adult diapers, glucose meters, hearing aids, hospital beds, reach-extenders/grabbers, etc.

name: OFFICE EQUIPMENT
details: printers, fax machines, scanners, calculators, telephones, headsets, etc.

name: PACKING MATERIAL / STYRO BOXES/COOLERS
details: clean foam peanuts, foam sheets, and bubble wrap

name: SCHOOL SUPPLIES
details: paper, pens, pencils, crayons, markers, backpacks, rulers, etc.

name: TOILETRIES
details: shampoo, deodorant, lotion, sh ving supplies, feminine products, travel-size items, etc.
